exams.title: The Lost Key
exams.story: John had always been careful with his keys, but one day, he found himself locked out of his own house with no one around to help.

exams.title: A Chance Encounter
exams.story: On a rainy afternoon, Emma bumped into an old friend she hadn't seen in years, and they decided to catch up over coffee, reminiscing about their shared past.

exams.title: The Secret Garden
exams.story: Lucy discovered a hidden garden behind her grandmother's house, filled with exotic plants and flowers she had never seen before, and spent her summer exploring its mysteries.

exams.title: The Unexpected Gift
exams.story: On his birthday, Mark received a mysterious package with no return address, containing a rare book he had been searching for his entire life.

exams.title: The Mysterious Signal
exams.story: Astronomer Liam detected a strange signal from a distant star, sparking a series of events that would change the course of human history.

exams.title: The Forgotten Letter
exams.story: While cleaning out the attic, Sarah found an old letter addressed to her grandmother, revealing a family secret that had been buried for decades.

exams.title: The Lonely Lighthouse
exams.story: Every night, the old lighthouse stood alone on the cliff, its light a beacon for ships, yet its keeper had not seen another soul in years.

exams.title: The Hidden Cave
exams.story: During a hike, Alex stumbled upon a hidden cave entrance and inside found ancient artifacts that spoke of a civilization long forgotten.

exams.title: The Stolen Painting
exams.story: The famous painting disappeared from the museum without a trace, and detective Harris was called to solve the mystery before it was too late.

exams.title: The Last Train
exams.story: Mia caught the last train home, not realizing that this journey would lead her to a series of unexpected adventures and new friends.

exams.title: The Time Capsule
exams.story: In their backyard, the children unearthed a time capsule from fifty years ago, filled with letters and items from a time long past.

exams.title: The Haunted Mansion
exams.story: The old mansion on the hill was said to be haunted, and one night, a group of friends decided to spend the night there to uncover the truth.

exams.title: The Lost City
exams.story: Deep in the jungle, explorers found the remains of a lost city, its history and treasures waiting to be discovered by the modern world.

exams.title: The Mysterious Stranger
exams.story: A stranger arrived in the small town, and with him came a series of events that would forever change the lives of its residents.

exams.title: The Silver Locket
exams.story: Emily found a silver locket at a flea market, and inside was a photo of a woman who looked exactly like her, leading her to investigate its origins.

exams.title: The Secret Passage
exams.story: Behind the old bookshelf in the library, David discovered a secret passage that led to a hidden room filled with ancient books and artifacts.

exams.title: The Golden Compass
exams.story: Lily inherited a golden compass from her grandfather, and it seemed to have a mind of its own, guiding her to places she never knew existed.
